extendedInfo.description: A board game classic receives cool new features. In addition to ships you are given an extended arsenal which includes planes, sea mines and air defense. Put your ships in battle order, provide them with protection using planes and mines, and launch strikes on the opponentâs fleet from sea and air.Battleship is a lively animated game with graphic effects. Game modes:1. Android mode â choose your computer opponent level and get bonus points for beating him.2. Two players mode â Want to play against your friend but donât have a second phone? No problem! Separately arrange your ships, planes and mines and start the battle.3. Bluetooth mode â challenge your friends and colleagues via Bluetooth.Get bonus points for each victory and use them to buy planes, mines and air defense.*****Itâs high time to find out who is the best at Battleship!*****To play via bluetooth, do the following:1) Click the "Play via Bluetooth" button2) Enable Bluetooth on your phone.3) Click the "Show Me" button on both phones.4) One of the player clicks the "Search" button, selects the second player phone from the devices list.5) If you can not join in, then the other player does point 4.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Love the board game and this one is very simple and entertaining
reviews.author: Rachael Lynn

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Fun game, it\'s the best battleships game that I could find on play store. There is a classic or advanced mode, (bomber planes and mines.) Bluetooth battle is really fun! Hope they add online battle, that would be brilliant.
reviews.author: Joe Nathan

reviews.comment: Kinda like mine sweeper with out thought.  Hunt and peck hope your lucky you will win\tBasic game still interesting how it works and much better if you can play your child or any 2nd player so its based on skill not luck
reviews.author: Ryan Rollins

reviews.title: Not very good
reviews.comment: Too many small shops to sink. Cannot put ships too close together. Uninstalling because it just does not satisfy.
reviews.author: Paige Lennon

reviews.title: Never even got to play
reviews.comment: It stopped responding before I was even able to start playing it for the first time. Tries a few more times with the same result so I am installing.
reviews.author: Nick Griffiths

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Amazing game, very entertaining and I absolutely Looooooooove the interface, thumbs up guys
reviews.author: Antoine Atallah

reviews.title: Loving this App & Game
reviews.comment: I just played my 1st game & I Love it Already. I love the sound effects. It is also quick. I Love this Game & app.
reviews.author: Mervyn Thorne

reviews.title: Pretty neat.
reviews.comment: This game is interesting and a good time killer.. It\'d a 5star if it had more weapons.. Like nuclear, cuz the normal weapons have a range of single block , so u need to keep trying.. All in all good game.
reviews.author: Akash Girimath

reviews.title: Love it. Just wish you could do it with wifi is well
reviews.comment: I really like the Bluetooth settings for your friends but needs wifi
reviews.author: William Coleman

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Just like we used to play in SEAsia all those long years ago.  Luv it!
reviews.author: Tim Anable

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: A good game,  would be better if you could play online rather than just again a android,  players using the same phone or bluetooth
reviews.author: Michael Yates

reviews.title: Ok game for now graphic s
reviews.comment: Ok game move smooth and fast. Have not teied bluetooth yet
reviews.author: Bill Tomson

reviews.comment: Not a bad game it is pretty easy to play almost like the board graphics aren\'t bad would give 5 stars but just played my first game will change stars after playing a few times it asked me to rate it after my first time so I\'ll give 4 stars for now
reviews.author: Matt Davis

reviews.title: Bluetooth Issues
reviews.comment: Unable to connect to anyone using Bluetooth. When trying to show my device or connecting to one, application force closes.
reviews.author: Brenden Burton

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: If you could save the game to come back to, I\'d would has given it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jana Sorge

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I love how quick it starts up and the drawings are very cool indeed!
reviews.author: andy gilchrist

reviews.title: Not bad at all
reviews.comment: I like the whole paper drawn aspect to this. And the booms. I like it. Its simple.
reviews.author: Emma Buckley

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: I would give this 5 stars but when you are playing against the computer it kills on ship and 2 more in row. Vary hard to beat. Can you guys fix that. Thank you.
reviews.author: Will Brewer

reviews.title: Grate!!!!
reviews.comment: Good all game. Love the desing. Just like 20 years ago :-)
reviews.author: Momo Grujic

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Is a fun game, but I think the computer can tell where my shops are lol
reviews.author: Christopher Fulton
